text: A Generation () is a 1955 Polish World War II drama movie. It was directed by Andrzej Wajda. It is based on the book Pokolenie by Bohdan Czeszko. Actors include Tadeusz Łomnicki, Urszula Modrzyńska, Tadeusz Janczar, Ryszard Kotys, and Roman Polanski. This was the first movie of the "Three Wars" trilogy by director Andrzej Wajda, followed by Kanal and Ashes and Diamonds. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 drama movies Category:1955 war movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Andrzej Wajda
title: A Generation
